description: The Asociación Café Sello Mujer is an initiative based in Caicedonia, Valle del Cauca, focused on empowering women coffee growers. Established by a group of women leaders, the association aims to enhance the recognition and economic viability of female coffee producers who have historically been undervalued in the market. Through technical training, economic education, and support in sustainable agricultural practices, the association fosters a sense of community and collaboration among its members. It emphasizes the importance of environmental sustainability by utilizing organic farming methods and promoting the use of safe fertilizers. The initiative also seeks to create a collective brand that represents the quality of their coffee, allowing members to market their products more effectively while encouraging individual branding efforts. Overall, the association strives to improve the quality of life for its members by providing them with the tools and knowledge necessary for economic independence and social empowerment.
name: Café Mujer
